A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was very unhappy with this film. 
The plot was weak and nonsensical--a hot mess of explosions and casual killing of core characters. 
The characters were poorly developed and inconsistent with previous installments. The dialogue largely consisted of worn platitudes and mindless drivel. 
The humor was out of place and silly. 
The placement of adorable space-birds for the sole purpose of selling future toys and action-figures was mildly infuriating. 
The agendas of Disney and its absurd and transparent advocacy were cumbersome and detracted from the quality of the movie. (Yes\, we understand that white pasty-faced men are the aggressors and purple-haired women are the noble saviors of the galaxy.)
A colossal waste of time and money. Do not see
